Title: Sniper 2
Writer: Michael Frost Beckner (characters), Crash Leyland (characters), Ron Mita, Jim McClain
Actors: Tom Berenger, Bokeem Woodbine, Erika Marozsán, Tamás Puskás
Plot: A former Marine sniper is lured back in on a top-secret mission to take out a rogue general who is committing atrocities on the Muslim population. His partner in this mission is a death-row...
